Others: Sheppard only received 6:33 minutes in the first half and went scoreless.
He made two shots on his two attempts and added one rebound and four assists in 12 minutes of second-half action.
All of his 12 minutes came in the fourth quarter with the Rockets trailing 98-76.
Houston Rockets probably weren't the right fit for Reed Sheppard.
NBA analyst Kevin O'Connor believes the Rockets should restrict Fred VanVleet to 30 minutes and offer 16-20 minutes nightly for Sheppard.
